channel.title: CVE Feed for jfarthing84 -- Theme My Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jfarthing84 -- Theme My Login

item.title: CVE-2024-7422|2024-08-16T15:09:37.311Z -- jfarthing84 -- theme%20my%20login
item.description: The Theme My Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 7.1.7. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the tml_admin_save_ms_settings() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the theme's settings via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. Please note that this only affects multi-site instances.
